channel.title: life on Eric Khun
channel.description: Recent content in life on Eric Khun

item.title: Hi, I'm Eric :)
item.description: Hi there, thanks for cheking the blog! I’m Eric, engineer at Buffer. I’ve been working remotely since 2013 now, from different place in the world. I happen to be mostly in Asia, my favorite part of the world. I’m travelling quite a bit, I’d like share a little bit of the place I’m visiting, my experiences, challenges about remote work. If you happen to read this and find my post interesting, just let me know!
